sections.MISSION:

sections.EXECUTION:
): Platoons will ruck to the range carrying M240 MG and water cans to increase the physical challenge. They will then conduct Stryker and Dismount Hide and Seek. Afterwards they will conduct a ruck back to the Bull footprint.
Phase 3:(Reconsolidation): Troops will consolidate weapons and conduct recovery operations.
